data.title: Sidharth malhotra Tunisian FC
data.meta_description: Siddharth Malhotra is an Indian model turned actor who is popular in bollywood. He came into limelight with Karan Johar's movie Student ...
data.text:
Siddharth Malhotra is an Indian model turned actor who is popular in bollywood. He came into limelight with Karan Johar's movie Student of the year opposite Alia Bhatt and Varun Dhawan.

Siddharth Malhotra Biography

Malhotra was born in Delhi on January 16, 1985 . He did his schooling from St. Xavier's School, Delhi. While in college, he appeared inNIIT and Pantaloons commercials. He started modeling for Roberto Cavalli’s advertisement campaigns and appeared on the covers of several magazines including RedBook, Gladrags and Men’s Health. He quit the modeling industry to become an actor, prior to which, he was the assistant director of My Name Is Khan (2010)

Personal Profile

Name : Siddharth Malhotra

Nick Name : Sid

Date of birth : January 16, 1985

Age : 28 years

Height : 6'

Birthplace : Delhi, India

Religion : Hindu

Girlfriend : Costa Rican model, Natalie

Marital Status : Unmarried

Hometown : Mumbai,Maharashtra

Educational Qualification : B.com from Delhi University

Occupation : Model,Actor

Debut Movie : Student of The Year

Debut serial : Prithviraj Chauhan

In 2012, Malhotra made his debut in Karan Johar's Student of the Year alongside Varun Dhawan and Alia Bhatt

honours[

2013: Times of India's Most Desirable Men of 2012 #12

2013: Koimoi Audience Poll 2012 Best Debut : Runner Up

2013: Indicine Audience Poll Best Debut 2012 : Winner

2013: Pinkvilla Audience Poll Best Debut : Winner

2013: Bollywood Life Awards Most Rocking Debut : Winner

2013: The Times of India Hotlist Most Promising Newcomer 2012

2013: The Times of India 50 Handsome Hunks in 100 years of Indian Cinema :

Girlfriend

Siddharth Malhotra is dating a south africa model, Natalie. He met her while working on the US schedule of My Name Is Khan (2010). They too have been dating for two years.

Siddharth Malhotra and Manish Malhotra

Siddharth Malhotra and Manish Malhotra, both being Malhotra it feels that they must be related as they both belongs to the fashion industry too but this all stuff is fake they are not related. It is a rumour that Siddharth Malhotra is a nephew of Manish Malhotra. Sid is NOT Manish Malhotra's nephew,this he has said this numerous times. Anythings possible in bollywood. They culd be somehow related and they might be hiding this on purpose to show that they dont only give chances to people related to the industry as said by a women who worked with siddharth and thats why she probably found this out on the sets.

Upcoming Movie Hasee Toh Phasee

Hasee Toh Phasee is an upcoming romantic comedy film directed by Vinil Mathew and produced by Karan Johar. The film features Sidharth Malhotra and Parineeti Chopra in the lead roles. Sidharth Malhotra plays the role of Nikhil in the movie. On his role in the flick, he said, "Nikhil is very ambitious. He wants to do well. He is a bit confused in terms of doing what his family wants and what he wants."

Interesting Facts

Siddharth was discovered by a modeling agent in a cafe at the age of 16

2. He has acted in the Indian TV Show, Prithviraj Chauhan with Rajat Tokas as a child artist

3. Siddharth has done ramp shows in countries such as India, Dubai, Paris, Milan, New York and Singapore

4. Due to his contract with Gladrags, he was unable to play the role of a model in the National award winning movie, Fashion starring Priyanka Chopra.

Siddharth Malhotra, model-turned-actor has impressed everyone with his perfomance in SOTY. Ekta is very impressed with his overall looks and talent. According to her, he has the intensity of Ajay Devgan along with the looks of Akshay Kumar and Salman Khan and has made plans to sign Siddharth in her next film.Karan johar sent siddarth and varun to pineapple studio, london to learn dance.

Siddharth Malhotra, who is being appreciated for his performances in Karan Johar’s Student Of The Year (SOTY), and said to have also been offered their next movies by the filmmaker. Siddharth Malhotra's Student Of The Year (SOTY), is expected cross the 60 crore mark at the domestic box office in the first week which has made 9.5 crores in just one day. It's the biggest opening ever for a film starring newcomers. The first day collection was bigger than many big-budget movies that released this year.

Siddharth who comes from Non-filmy background has to work really hard to make it big in bollywood, but efforts has paid.But this handsome,charming boy with incredibly, cute smile has won everyone's heart, Post SOTY release everyone praised his performance. Bollywood biggies have started saying that Sidharth is going to be the next big thing in Bollywood. His pet labrador is only companion in mumbai as he lives alone.

siddharth Malhotra loves to eat sweets(Meetha)siddharth Malhotra loves meetha a lot and Gulab Jamun are his favourite and he loves to eat them with pickle. There's a story behind such combo once he was eating couple of Gulab Jamuns and his brother dropped pickle over it and he just got hooked to that combination right from then. When he was kid he used to lie to his granny about needing money for something or the other in school and used to eat hot choclates in school with that money.

Siddharth Malhotra A Sports Freak Siddharth says he is obsessive about playing some sports and gets restless if he don't play anything. He believes playing any sports gives an outlet to all your emotions anger,stress,love and all.

Siddhrth Malhotra is planning his next script again with Karan Johar. In an interview he told that there is a script that he is thinking about, it is with Dharma Productions only but he haven't signed it yet and nothing is confirmed. If he get something bigger than that he will think about it else there's always a film with Dharma Productions. Siddharth alongwith his co-stars of Student of the Year were bound by contracts with Dharma Productions but it’s an easy one. They can work outside Dharma group. And He personally feels Who doesn't want to be in Dharma Productions only

. Siddharth considers himself to be the lucky one to get his debut in Bollywood with Karan Johar.

Siddharth Malhotra, Varun Dhawan, Karan Johar at Chivas Studio day 1 in Grand Hyatt on 23rd Nov 2012. The Chivas Studio 2012 proved to be a blend of cinema, art, installation and music. Karan Johar Brand ambassador of Chivas India, says, "It has been an exciting opportunity for me to be a part of this initiative this year and creating the Chivas short film with Shakun Batra, an ace director of recent times. The brand is all about brotherhood and collaborations, and making this short film has been a refreshing experience for me." "Strangers in the Night" short film directed by Shakun Batrathat stars Yolanda Mclellan, Mohit Marwah and Saba Azad was presented by Karan Johar and Chivas. Siddharth Malhotra recieved 42 bouques from his female following fans on his 28th birthday.
